citation.name: Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. U.S.A.
citation.title: p66Alpha-MBD2 coiled-coil interaction and recruitment of Mi-2 are critical for globin gene silencing by the MBD2-NuRD complex.

reference.scope: STRUCTURE BY NMR OF 137-178 IN COMPLEX WITH MBD2
SUBUNIT
INTERACTION WITH MBD2

comment.text: Transcriptional repressor. Enhances MBD2-mediated repression. Efficient repression requires the presence of GATAD2B.

Interacts with MBD2 and MBD3 (PubMed:12183469, PubMed:16415179, PubMed:21490301). Interaction with MBD2 is required for the enhancement of MBD2-mediated repression and for targeting to the chromatin (PubMed:12183469, PubMed:16415179, PubMed:21490301). Component of the MeCP1 histone deacetylase complex (PubMed:21490301). Interacts with histone tails, including that of histones H2A, H2B, H3 and H4 (PubMed:16415179). This interaction is reduced by histone acetylation (PubMed:16415179). Interacts with ERCC6 (PubMed:26030138).
Speckled nuclear localization requires both CR1 and CR2 regions.
Ubiquitous, both in fetal and adult tissues.
Both CR1 and CR2 regions are required for speckled nuclear localization.

property.value: MBD2/NuRD nucleosome remodeling and deacetylase complex
MBD3/NuRD nucleosome remodeling and deacetylase complex
ERCC6 (CSB) and EHMT2 (G9a) positively regulate rRNA expression
Regulation of TP53 Activity through Acetylation
Expressed in female gonad and 235 other tissues
P:negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
